KWG Group Holdings Real Estate Overview | Generated by AI

Home 2025.09

合景泰富地产, also known as KWG Group Holdings, is a prominent real estate company based in Guangzhou, Guangdong. The company has a significant presence in the real estate sector, with a focus on property development and management. As of 2023, KWG Group Holdings has expanded its footprint to over 40 core cities across China, developing more than 400 high-quality benchmark projects. Notable projects include developments in key areas such as Guangzhou’s Pearl River New City CBD, Guangzhou’s Pazhou CBD, Guangzhou Financial City CBD, Shanghai CBD, and Chengdu High-tech Zone CBDue202turn0search3.

Company Overview

  • Name: KWG Group Holdings Limited (合景泰富集團控股有限公司)
  • Industry: Real Estate - Development
  • Location: Guangzhou, Guangdong, China
  • Employees: Approximately 1,800 full-time employees
  • Total Assets: As of December 31, 2018, the company’s total assets reached approximately 184.5 billion yuan, with a total construction area of about 16.58 million square meters2turn0search6.

Business Segments

KWG Group Holdings operates through several business segments, primarily focusing on:

  • Property Development: Engages in the sale of properties.
  • Property Investment and Management: Involves the leasing of investment properties.
  • Hotel Operation: Manages hotel operations as part of its diversified portfolio.
  • Construction Services: Provides construction services to support its development projects2turn0search7.

Key Projects and Locations

The company has a strong presence in several key locations, including:

  • Guangzhou: Pearl River New City CBD, Pazhou CBD, Financial City CBD
  • Shanghai: CBD
  • Chengdu: High-tech Zone CBD

These projects underscore the company’s commitment to developing high-quality real estate in strategic urban areas2turn0search3.

Financial and Operational Highlights

  • Total Assets: Approximately 184.5 billion yuan as of the end of 2018.
  • Construction Area: About 16.58 million square meters.
  • Market Presence: The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange under the ticker 1813.HK2turn0search4.

Strategic Focus

KWG Group Holdings is deeply involved in the real estate sector, with a strategic focus on developing high-quality projects in core urban areas. The company’s operations are not limited to property development but also include property investment and management, hotel operations, and construction services, making it a comprehensive player in the real estate industry2turn0search7.
